title: Remove Courier Partners section and navigation link from single-page layout

requirements.summary: Remove the Courier Partners section from the single-page layout so it no longer renders.
acceptanceCriteria: The Courier Partners section is no longer rendered in the main page flow (it should not appear between Coverage and Tracking anymore).
The Courier Partners section does not appear in the DOM and cannot be reached by scrolling.

file_operations.description: Remove the CourierPartnersSection import and remove the <CourierPartnersSection /> from the main section composition so it no longer renders between Coverage and Tracking.
Delete the CourierPartnersSection implementation so the "courier-partners" section anchor cannot be rendered anywhere in the app.

requirements.summary: Remove the "Courier Partners" navigation link from header navigation (desktop and mobile).
acceptanceCriteria: Desktop navigation no longer shows a "Courier Partners" link.
Mobile navigation no longer shows a "Courier Partners" link.
No navigation action attempts to scroll to "#courier-partners".

file_operations.description: Remove the "Courier Partners" entry from the navLinks array so neither the desktop buttons nor the mobile Sheet menu renders or attempts to scroll to "#courier-partners".

requirements.summary: Remove any remaining in-app references to the "#courier-partners" anchor to prevent broken navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: No UI element attempts to scroll to or reference "#courier-partners".
The page navigation and scrolling behavior continues to work for all remaining sections (Home, Services, About, Coverage, Tracking, Label Print, Booking, Contact).

file_operations.description: Audit the header scroll navigation to ensure no remaining references to "#courier-partners" exist after removing the nav link, and verify scrollToSection continues working for all remaining section anchors.
Audit the main section composition to ensure there are no remaining references to the removed "courier-partners" anchor and that the order/anchors for the remaining sections are unchanged.
Audit footer quick links to confirm there is no "Courier Partners" link and no "#courier-partners" reference, keeping existing smooth scroll behavior for the remaining sections.
